solution_line_template: Since Rick and Jose's lunch cost was the same, Adam spent {adam_fraction}*{jose_lunch_cost} = ${<{adam_fraction}*{jose_lunch_cost}={adam_lunch_cost}>>{adam_lunch_cost} on his lunch.
The three friends ate food worth {adam_lunch_cost}+{jose_lunch_cost}+{rick_lunch_cost} = ${<{adam_lunch_cost}+{jose_lunch_cost}+{rick_lunch_cost}={total_lunch_cost}>>{total_lunch_cost}
